name: v2.4.2
body:
Many companies are successfully building with rules_js.
If you're getting value from the project, please let us know!
Just comment on our [Adoption Discussion](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/discussions/1000).

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:
```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_js", version = "2.4.2")

####### Node.js version #########
# By default you get the node version from DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION in @rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl
# Optionally you can pin a different node version:
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "6.3.0")
node = use_extension("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:extensions.bzl", "node", dev_dependency = True)
node.toolchain(node_version = "16.14.2")
#################################

npm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "npm", dev_dependency = True)

npm.npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

use_repo(npm, "npm")

pnpm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "pnpm")

# Allows developers to use the matching pnpm version, for example:
# bazel run -- @pnpm --dir /home/runner/work/rules_js/rules_js install
use_repo(pnpm, "pnpm")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_js",
    sha256 = "b71565da7a811964e30cccb405544d551561e4b56c65f0c0aeabe85638920bd6",
    strip_prefix = "rules_js-2.4.2",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/download/v2.4.2/rules_js-v2.4.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:repositories.bzl", "rules_js_dependencies")

rules_js_dependencies()

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:toolchains.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "rules_js_register_toolchains")

rules_js_register_toolchains(node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:repositories.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* fix: do not output every js_run_devserver watch protocol error by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2287
* fix: cleanup js_run_devserver watch protocol socket callbacks by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2288


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/compare/v2.4.1...v2.4.2

## What's Changed
* add data runfiles to js_run_devserver sandbox by @janantharaj in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2241
* fix(deps): update dependency @pnpm/logger to v5.2.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1955
* docs: remove reference to WORKSPACE in README instructions by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2247
* ci: remove x86_64_linux_remote platform config by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2248
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2249
* fix(js_run_devserver): delete full sandbox directory on exit by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2250
* feat: support pnpm v10 by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2101
* perf: avoid extra js_run_devserver regex mem allocation by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2254
* feat: add experimental incremental watch protocol support by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2230
* perf: avoid use of .to_list() in js_run_devserver data files list by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2255
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2251
* perf: determine js_run_devserver file vs directory in rule by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2256
* perf: reduce memory allocation in fs patches by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2252
* refactor: add bazel_ibp_support tag to js_run_devserver by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2259
* perf: js_run_devserver by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2257
* perf: use native mkdirSync recursive:true in js_run_devserver by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2264
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2268
* fix: add console log when removing js_run_devserver sandbox by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2269
* Update helper message when ASPECT_RULES_JS_FROZEN_PNPM_LOCK=true by @Wito-1 in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2266
* fix: correct early exit from _parse_lockfile by @lukaszwawrzyk in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2270
* fix: do not require `_lcov_merger` under coverage by @gzm0 in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2273
* perf: reduce js_run_devserver cycle event parsing memory usage by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2274
* refactor: js_run_devserver file deletions based on watch protocol by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2271

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/compare/v2.3.8...v2.4.0

* fix: correctly track treeartifact contents by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2217
* test: separate optional + lifecycle lockfile test packages by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2207
* fix: add warnings for deprecated js_run_devserver,js_run_binary include_types,npm_sources attrs by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2225
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2227
* chore: fix bzl_libraries by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2232
* chore: format js_run_devserver.mjs by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2234
* chore: move docs back from aspect docsite. by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2235
* fix: pnpm v9 lockfile git versions containing : by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2231

name: v2.3.5
body:
Many companies are successfully building with rules_js.
If you're getting value from the project, please let us know!
Just comment on our [Adoption Discussion](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/discussions/1000).

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:
```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_js", version = "2.3.5")

####### Node.js version #########
# By default you get the node version from DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION in @rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl
# Optionally you can pin a different node version:
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "6.3.0")
node = use_extension("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:extensions.bzl", "node", dev_dependency = True)
node.toolchain(node_version = "16.14.2")
#################################

npm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "npm", dev_dependency = True)

npm.npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

use_repo(npm, "npm")

pnpm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "pnpm")

# Allows developers to use the matching pnpm version, for example:
# bazel run -- @pnpm --dir /home/runner/work/rules_js/rules_js install
use_repo(pnpm, "pnpm")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_js",
    sha256 = "1be1a3ec3d3baec4a71bc09ce446eb59bb48ae31af63016481df1532a0d81aee",
    strip_prefix = "rules_js-2.3.5",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/download/v2.3.5/rules_js-v2.3.5.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:repositories.bzl", "rules_js_dependencies")

rules_js_dependencies()

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:toolchains.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "rules_js_register_toolchains")

rules_js_register_toolchains(node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:repositories.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* fix: accept empty, relative or absolute js_image_layer(root) paths by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2153

* feat: add contrib/nextjs rules for building and running nextjs applications by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2150
* chore: add bazel8 ci by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1929
* refactor: move stardoc to docs/ submodule by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2154
* chore: don't compile protoc under docs/ either by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2156


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/compare/v2.3.4...v2.3.5

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "6.2.0")
node = use_extension("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:extensions.bzl", "node", dev_dependency = True)
node.toolchain(node_version = "16.14.2")
#################################

npm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "npm", dev_dependency = True)

npm.npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

use_repo(npm, "npm")

pnpm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "pnpm")

# Allows developers to use the matching pnpm version, for example:
# bazel run -- @pnpm --dir /home/runner/work/rules_js/rules_js install
use_repo(pnpm, "pnpm")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_js",
    sha256 = "91655ebd3178f979fcacd018f8f42aa9d3bc79c4fbddb7be9521971ec77e6aee",
    strip_prefix = "rules_js-2.0.2",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/download/v2.0.2/rules_js-v2.0.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:repositories.bzl", "rules_js_dependencies")

rules_js_dependencies()

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:toolchains.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "rules_js_register_toolchains")

rules_js_register_toolchains(node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:repositories.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* perf(npm): use actions.run instead of actions.run_shell by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1905
* refactor(npm): improve pnpm.onlyBuiltDependencies error message by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1902
* chore: use aspect workflows RBE by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1908
* chore: now testing on Aspect Workflows RBE by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1909
* perf: avoid large array concatenation by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1883
* doc: add callout for dependency on generate_bzl_library_targets by @plobsing in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1911
* fix(npm): respect npm_package include_transitive_sources attribute by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1912
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1906
* docs(pnpm): add note about pnpm vs bazel patching by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1916

name: v2.0.0
body:
This is our first semver-major release since 1.0 and has some breaking changes.
These are documented in the [rules_js 2.0 migration guide](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/blob/main/docs/migrate_2.md).
Note that you'll need to upgrade other rules that depend on rules_js at the same time.

There is a known issue with usage on Windows: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/issues/1739
If you use rules_js on Windows we'd love to know about it. Having active users justifies prioritizing the fix.

## Using Bzlmod (recommended):

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:
```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_js", version = "2.0.0")

####### Node.js version #########
# By default you get the node version from DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION in @rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl
# Optionally you can pin a different node version:
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "6.2.0")
node = use_extension("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:extensions.bzl", "node", dev_dependency = True)
node.toolchain(node_version = "16.14.2")
#################################

npm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "npm", dev_dependency = True)

npm.npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

use_repo(npm, "npm")

pnpm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "pnpm")

# Allows developers to use the matching pnpm version, for example:
# bazel run -- @pnpm --dir /home/runner/work/rules_js/rules_js install
use_repo(pnpm, "pnpm")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> See https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/issues/1671 for list of BREAKING CHANGES in rules_js 2.0. We'll copy over the list of BREAKING CHANGES to these release notes soon.
>
> Downstream rulesets will also require updates to their latest RCs along with this upgrade:
> https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_cypress/releases/tag/v0.6.0-rc0
> https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/releases/tag/v0.21.0-rc1
> https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/releases/tag/v2.0.0-rc0
> https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/tag/v0.22.0-rc0
> https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/releases/tag/v2.0.0-rc0
> https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_swc/releases/tag/v2.0.0-rc0
> https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_ts/releases/tag/v3.0.0-rc0
> https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/releases/tag/v0.16.0-rc0

Many companies are successfully building with rules_js.
If you're getting value from the project, please let us know!
Just comment on our [Adoption Discussion](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/discussions/1000).

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:
```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_js", version = "2.0.0-rc4")

####### Node.js version #########
# By default you get the node version from DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION in @rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl
# Optionally you can pin a different node version:
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "6.1.0")
node = use_extension("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:extensions.bzl", "node", dev_dependency = True)
node.toolchain(node_version = "16.14.2")
#################################

npm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "npm", dev_dependency = True)

npm.npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

use_repo(npm, "npm")

pnpm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "pnpm")

# Allows developers to use the matching pnpm version, for example:
# bazel run -- @pnpm --dir /home/runner/work/rules_js/rules_js install
use_repo(pnpm, "pnpm")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_js",
    sha256 = "00ee2310ced0cf524ba0b5f82805874a485b400a9bd1b13a4d1a487c4764e02a",
    strip_prefix = "rules_js-2.0.0-rc4",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/download/v2.0.0-rc4/rules_js-v2.0.0-rc4.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:repositories.bzl", "rules_js_dependencies")

rules_js_dependencies()

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:toolchains.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "rules_js_register_toolchains")

rules_js_register_toolchains(node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:repositories.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* fix(pnpm): pnpm9 npm: dependencies with peers by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1776
* refactor: remote non-functional exclude_declarations_from_npm_packages alias by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1778
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1771
* refactor(pnpm): move pnpm parsing logic to pnpm.bzl by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1777

## New Contributors
* @github-actions made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1771

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/compare/v2.0.0-rc3...v2.0.0-rc4

## What's Changed
* chore: bump miminum dep to aspect_bazel_lib 2.7.6 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1755
* refactor: simplify handling of #423, package aliases by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1757
* refactor: move npm_registry_url to utils by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1758
* refactor: do not include registry url in package keys by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1759
* feat: add include_npm_sources to npm_package by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1760
* docs: update section on "Exec failed due to IOException" by @fmeum in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1761
* fix: include package store directory in default output of npm_link_package_store by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1762
* chore: bump minimum aspect_bazel_lib to 2.7.7 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1763
* test: add lockfile test cases by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1764
* chore: automate pnpm version mirroring by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1766
* fix(pnpm): support pnpm9 URL, github version package versions by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1765
* fix(pnpm): support npm: alias dependencies with pnpm lockfile v5 by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1767
* chore: bump to rules_oci 1.7.6 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1768
* refactor: sort generated npm_translate_lock store targets by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1769
* fix(pnpm): support npm: aliases to packages in alternate registries by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1770

## New Contributors
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1761

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/compare/v2.0.0-rc1...v2.0.0-rc2
